function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of infection in confined spaces such as offices, residential areas, and public buildings","Impact":"Higher probability of viral contamination and transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure adequate ventilation rates through natural or mechanical means, and follow specific guidelines for ventilation rate for different settings","Technologies":"HVAC systems, natural ventilation, controlled conditioning systems","People":"Occupants of offices, residential areas, public buildings","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Improper implementation of HVAC systems leading to increased risk of viral transmission","Impact":"HVAC systems becoming a source of viral transmission or spread","Mitigation":"Proper installation and maintenance of HVAC systems, following guidelines for air recirculation, maintaining proper temperature and humidity levels","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purification technologies","People":"Building owners, HVAC technicians, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Reduced ventilation rate due to decreased occupancy density leading to higher risk of infection","Impact":"Decreased ventilation rate resulting in higher concentration of contaminants in the air","Mitigation":"Implement measures to maintain adequate ventilation rates regardless of occupancy density, such as adjusting ventilation systems based on real-time occupancy","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, real-time ventilation control systems","People":"Occupants of offices, public vehicles","Owner":"Building owners, public transportation authorities"}]}
